Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Realistically \Re`al*is"tic*al*ly\, adv. In a realistic manner. [1913 Webster]
realistically adv 1: in a realistic manner; "let's look at the situation realistically" [ant: {unrealistically}] 2: in a realistic manner; "the figure was realistically painted"
